## Checklist

- [ ] Builds with `make` (no warnings with `-Wall -Wextra -Werror`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass (`./tests/test_integration.sh`)
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Valgrind clean (no leaks, no errors)
- [ ] Code follows project style (4-space indent, `snake_case`)
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
